name: Narcissus (itch)
description:
Winner of the 2019 BeachHacks Game Jam

https://devpost.com/software/beachhacksreflection

https://github.com/CrazyCreeper1o1/BeachHacksReflection

We really wanted to make a VR puzzle game similar to Portal.

It takes you through a few levels of different puzzles with increasing difficulty.

Your goal is to unlock the door at the end of the room and exit the room.

Objects reflected in the mirror may or may not interact with other objects in the mirror.

Controls:

WASD: Walk

Space: Jump

Click: Pickup objects.

(If you have mouse issues click on the window and it should lock your cursor)
